name: supplier
description: Supplier Microservice. Provides base CRUD Rest API for basic Supplier data manipulation.

scripts.dev: npm run setup-consul ; nodemon --watch src/server src/server/index.js
scripts.local: npm run setup-consul ; NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src/server www/index.js
scripts.test: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; nyc mocha -R mocha-junit-reporter src/**/*.test.js
scripts.setup-consul: curl -X PUT -d ${MYSQL_DATABASE} http://consul:8500/v1/kv/supplier/db-init/database ; curl -X PUT -d 'root' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/supplier/db-init/user ; curl -X PUT -d ${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD} http://consul:8500/v1/kv/supplier/db-init/password ; curl -X PUT -d 'true' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/supplier/db-init/populate-test-data ; curl -X PUT -d ${REDIS_AUTH} http://consul:8500/v1/kv/supplier/redis/password;  curl -X PUT -d 'svc_supplier' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/supplier/service-client/username; curl -X PUT -d 'test' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/supplier/service-client/password; curl -X PUT -d 'oidcCLIENT' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/supplier/service-client/client-key; curl -X PUT -d '91c0fabd17a9db3cfe53f28a10728e39b7724e234ecd78dba1fb05b909fb4ed98c476afc50a634d52808ad3cb2ea744bc8c3b45b7149ec459b5c416a6e8db242' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/supplier/service-client/client-secret
scripts.domain-doc: mkdir -p wiki/domain-doc ; sq2md --path-bl=index.js -o file-per-src -p wiki/domain-doc --field-bl=createdAt,updatedAt --output-ext=.model.md src/server/db/models
